      • Resources

        public Resources(DocumentContext context)
        creates a new resourcehandler for this documentcontext if not yet existent if a resourcehanler already exists, an illegalstateexception will be thrown
        Parameters:
        context - the documentcontext, for which a resourcehandle will be created
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a resourcehandle already exists

                 Resources.OpenMode mode)
          throws java.io.IOException
        opens the streams correlated to this file and openmode
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be opened
        mode - the mode in which this file is opened
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any exceptions occure during opening the streams

      • getInputStream

        public java.io.InputStream getInputStream(java.lang.String file)
        if an inputstream that is correlated to the specified file is opened it will be returned (else null will be returned)
        Parameters:
        file - the file for which an inputstream is searched
        Returns:
        the inputstream correlated to the specified file

      • getOutputStream

        public java.io.OutputStream getOutputStream(java.lang.String file)

      • closeAll

        public void closeAll(java.lang.String cause)

        Parameters:
